content: > use these codes to save when you buy > multiple patterns > - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns > - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns > - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns > > add all patterns to cart for discount > limit one use per purchase **free pattern available on my blog here ** https //www 1dogwoof com/wildflowers-tunic-crochet-pattern/ in the wildflowers tunic poppy stitches and eyelets are repeated to create a sweet lacy-but-not-too-lacy top you can make this any size you want by customizing the pattern repeats the free pattern for size s and xl along with an explanation of the pattern repeats are on my blog the paid pdf has instructions for sizes xs s m l xl 2xl a stitch chart and a schematic ……………………………………………………………………………… patterns are written in us crochet terminology and is available only in english ……………………………………………………………………………… making finished items you can sell finished products made from this pattern by giving credit to me as the designer and linking to the original blog post pattern please be respectful and do not sell or distribute this pattern in any way especially as your own instead share the original blog post link ……………………………………………………………………………… return policy there are no returns on digital files please contact me with any further questions ……………………………………………………………………………… thanks for browsing find me at website - www 1dogwoof com instagram - www instagram com/1dogwoof facebook - www facebook com/onedogwoof youtube - www youtube com/1dogwoof pinterest - www pinterest com/1dogwoof twitter - www twitter com/1dogwoof
